mapper.select: SELECT m.movie_no, name, Floor(m.price / 100 * (100 - m.sale)) AS price, IF(type = 'B', "구매", "대여") AS type, thumbnail FROM buy_count b, movie m WHERE b.movie_no = m.movie_no AND date >= DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -1 DAY) AND date < CURDATE() GROUP BY movie_no ORDER BY count(*) desc LIMIT 100;
SELECT movie_no FROM buy_count WHERE date >= DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -2 DAY) AND date < DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -1 DAY) GROUP BY movie_no ORDER BY count(*) desc LIMIT 100;

SELECT m.movie_no, name, Floor(m.price / 100 * (100 - m.sale)) AS price, IF(type = 'B', "구매", "대여") AS type, thumbnail FROM buy_count b, movie m WHERE b.movie_no = m.movie_no AND date >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL (WEEKDAY(NOW()) + 8) DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') AND date < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL (WEEKDAY(NOW()) + 2) DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY movie_no ORDER BY count(*) desc LIMIT 100;

SELECT movie_no FROM buy_count WHERE date >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL (WEEKDAY(NOW()) + 15) DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') AND date < DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL (WEEKDAY(NOW()) + 9) DAY), '%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY movie_no ORDER BY count(*) desc LIMIT 100;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM buy_count WHERE date <= DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -22 DAY);
